concept.title: Cork Float
concept.shortdesc: The cork float is a carburetor component that automatically regulates gasoline flow for proper engine operation.

conbody.p: The cork float maintains proper fuel levels within the carburetor by controlling gasoline flow. Correct float height is critical for engine performance:

ul.li: If positioned too low, engine starting becomes difficult
If positioned too high, the carburetor will flood and leak fuel

section.title: Maintenance
section.p: When a cork float becomes fuel soaked, it should be either:

ul.li: Thoroughly dried and waterproofed with two coats of liquid shellac
